actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide the conditions under which disinterment of descendents in national cemeteries may be authorized.

summary.text: Provides that interments in national cemeteries are to be considered final and permanent. Sets forth conditions under which disinterment of decedents in national cemeteries may be authorized. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1004).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide the conditions under which disinterment of descendents in national cemeteries may be authorized.
